ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] MY Enchanter
ygData.msgSnippet: If some of your spells are indeed there, your best hope is simply run like hell and trust Kunark aggro to do its thing. SOW would be a good idea, beyond that,
ygData.messageBody:
If some of your spells are indeed there, your best hope is simply run like
hell and trust Kunark aggro to do its thing. SOW would be a good idea,
beyond that, just keep going no matter how many and with enough distance
they'll forget about you. If you've got a decent amount of PP, you'll be
better off buying some of your spells in the baz, if you're poor or
adventurous, they drop in Skyfire and OS.
----- Original Message -----
From: mushuplus <mushuplus@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 28, 2005 3:07 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] MY Enchanter


> Well my ENC is only lvl 50.... it's mana is 2.4k. But i didn't buy
> equip to focus on HP (as an Enchanter) but i can't find where to buy
> the spells over lvl 50.... I thought it would be in Firiona Vie but
> there were no NPCs there =P. I think someone said it is over in the
> corner to the east side but i died trying to get there because the
> spider human things... lol they see invis at random then one attacked
> and they all cames. But luckily due to being a 6 years vete i used the
> Expedient Recovery vete AA. so i lived. But i would love to chat in
> the chat room over the subject, i will be on Tuesday 28th of june
> (today) in the chat room at 5:00 Mountain Time.
